text.eng: Current ministers are losing in the party elections.

text.eng: Farming is the main source of income in my family.

text.eng: A lot of costs were incurred in paying lawyers and transporting of witnesses.

text.teo: Aiteten akeje nuka emotoka ibusakinit aswam kangolikaru.
text.lgg: Ba ma 'ye whili ma otuza kililiru eli vusi
text.nyn: Okutereeza orupanka rwa mootoka kishemeraire kuba kinkirwa buri mwaka

text.eng: There are many beaches on Lake Victoria.
text.lug: Ku nnyanja Victoria kuliko emyalo mingi.
text.ach: Ka ma dano yweyo iye wigi dwong mada i dog nam me Victorai.
text.teo: Ipu idokena koicor loka Victoria.
text.lgg: Pari cinyaka driru 'diyi miri Victorianiri ma tia karakara.
text.nyn: Hariyo emwanya mingi y'orubaju rw'enyanja ya Nyarubaare.

text.eng: The police can try to resolve conflicts between the husband and the wife.
text.lug: Poliisi esobola okugezaako okugonjoola obutakkaanya wakati w'omwami n'omukyala.
text.ach: Abili twero temo cobo kuku kuku matye ikin dako ki laco
text.teo: Epedorete ipolisin aitam aitemokin ingungeta kiding ekilokit ka aberu.
text.lgg: Polisi eyi eco ngiringiri oku eyi ma eselea agupi beri otu ra
text.nyn: Poriisi neebaasa kugyezaho kutereeza obwimukiriro ahagati y'omushaija n'omukazi.

text.eng: My car is very old.
text.lug: Emmotoka yange nkadde nnyo.
text.ach: Mutoka na otii tutwal
text.teo: Emojongit emotoka ka.
text.lgg: Ma mutukari eri okpolo.
text.nyn: Emotoka yangye ekuzire munonga.

text.eng: The discovery left many surprised.
text.lug: Ekyazuulwa kyayanaamiriza bangi.
text.ach: Ngec man omiyo ngeng bot dano mapol.
text.teo: Apotu akiro ngun kisumokisi itunga noi.
text.lgg: E'yo tizu 'yeta nde ma dria ri fe yi ma karakarau dri eca osuta si
text.nyn: Ekyajumbwirwe kikareka bingi batangaire.

text.eng: Women gender associations have been formulated in Uganda.
text.lug: Ebibiina by'abakyala bigunjiddwawo mu Uganda.
text.ach: Dule ma neno lok pa mon tye i Uganda
text.teo: Associations nu angor kes etolomun ko Uganda.
text.lgg: Ba e'do amuti pa tupi e'yo oku eyini si 'diyi kari Uganda niri ma alea
text.nyn: Ebibiina by'abakazi, bitandikirweho omu Uganda.

text.eng: Empowering women encourages economic growth.
text.lug: Okutumbula abakyala kukubiriza eby'enkulaakulana mu by'enfuna.
text.ach: Tyelo kor mon kelo dongo lobo
text.teo: Aitigogong angor itopolori apol.
text.lgg: Ba erini tutuni oku eyi ma o'duko ezoanzi eyi pie ku e'yo peta ni 'diyi ma alea
text.nyn: Okwongyera abakazi amaani, nikireeta entunguuka.

text.eng: My wife demanded that we buy a plot of land to build our own house.
text.lug: Mukyala wange yampaliriza okugula poloti tuzimbemu ennyumba eyaffe ku bwaffe.
text.ach: Dako mega orido ni myero wawil ngom me gedo ot mamegwa.
text.teo: Abu akaberu kotema ebe ibusakinit sio agwelun epuloti loka alupok kasodete adukokin etogokosi.
text.lgg: Ma okuni le kini ama ma je angu lizani jo amani ama ngulupisi ni sizu
text.nyn: Omukazi wangye akanshaba tugure itaka twombeke enju eyaitu.

text.eng: The area stinks because a sewage pipe burst this morning.
text.lug: Ekifo kikyuuma kubanga omuddumu gwa kazambi gwayabise ku makya leero.
text.ach: Kabedo ne ngwece tye kaduny marac tutwal pien paipo me wot pa coron omwoc odiko matin.
text.teo: Ebos aiboisit ngin naarai abu apaipo naka akipi nuecoloni kobwanga atupuruc na.
text.lgg: Angu nderi ni nguu a'disikuni payibu azakoza ni razuri afi obitirosi ni
text.nyn: Omwanya nigunuka kubi ahabwokuba erupiira rw'oburofa rwashandaara omu kasheshe eraizooba.

text.eng: How can I get new ideas?
text.lug: Nsobola ntya okufuna ebirowoozo ebipya?
text.ach: Atwero nongo tam manyen nining?
text.teo: Eipone ali adumuna eong aomisio nuitetiak?
text.lgg: Ma eco egata o'diru 'diyi esu ngoniru?
text.nyn: Nimbasa nta kutunga ebiteekateeko ebisya?

text.eng: The teachers should attend to the learner's needs equally.
text.lug: Abasomesa balina okufa ku byetaago by'abayizi kyenkanyi.
text.ach: Lupwonye omyero gumii pwony ki lutino weng marom
text.teo: Ekot esisianakinak aingaranakin esisiak ne ejaunor eipuda.
text.lgg: Le imba'ba eyi ma fe dri e'yo anzi onita onipi 'diyi niri ma dria trotro.
text.nyn: Abeegyesa bashemereire kuhurikiza abeegi boona ebi barikwetenga batarikushoroora.

text.eng: The Rwanda leadership now views Museveni as an enemy.
text.lug: Obukulembeze bwa Rwanda bulaba Museveni ng'omulabe.
text.ach: Lutela ma I Rwanda kombedi dong gineno Museveni calo lamone
text.teo: Eseseni kwana engarenon loko Rwanda Museveni kwape lokasurup.
text.lgg: Drileka Rwandaari sa'disi Musevenii ni dre aribo ru
text.nyn: Abebembezi ba Rwanda obwahati nibareeba Museveni nk’omuzigu.

text.eng: There is a meeting between sub-county extension workers and Village Health Teams.
text.lug: Waliwo ensisinkano wakati w'abakozi b'e Ggombolola ne ttiimu z'ekyalo ez'ebyobulamu.
text.ach: Kacoke moo tye ikin lumii ngec me pur ma nonge ikin gangi ki Lumii ngec me yot kom ma ikin gangi
text.teo: Ejai airiamun kiding eswamak lu iyakiaritai otem keda ijaka lu angaleu kocaalo.
text.lgg: Mitingi azi azi'ba sabu kawunti ni 'diyi pi ma eselea amuti rua ala ni caloa 'diyi be ri ni mu drile
text.nyn: Hariho orukiiko rwabahingisa aha gomborora hamwe na tiimu y'abashaho baha byaro.

text.eng: The hawker sells apples only.
text.lug: Omutembeeyi atunda apo zokka.
text.ach: Lacat ma woto awota-ni cato nyig yat apol keken.
text.teo: Egwelanari etunganan ngol apples.
text.lgg: Ba afa ozip acizarurini lu apo yi ozi'i
text.nyn: Omuteebeyi naaguza za apo zonka.

text.eng: She desperately wants to get married this year.
text.lug: Ayagala nnyo okufumbirwa omwaka guno.
text.ach: Nyakoni mito nyome I mwaka-ni.
text.teo: Ekoto ngesi noi adukokin okaru lo?
text.lgg: Eri le ndra asi driasi agupi 'duzu eli 'disi ra
text.nyn: Naayendera kimwe kushwerwa omwaka ogu.

text.eng: She welcomed them on the team.
text.lug: Yabaaniriza ku ttiimu.
text.ach: En ojologi I tim ne.
text.teo: Abu ngesi kisukuny kesi otimu.
text.lgg: A'i yi amuti ongulumu ru ma dria ra
text.nyn: Akabaakyiira aha tiimu.

text.eng: He services his loan through monthly payments that are collected by the bank off his salary.
text.lug: Ssente zeyeewola azisasula buli mwezi okuva ku ezo bbanka z'esala ku musaala gw'afuna buli mwezi.
text.ach: En culo loan dwe ki dwe kun bank aye ngolo ki I mucara ma en nongo.
text.teo: Etacenenei ngesi elonike itosomai eropitike loka angolilap loetubonorete luka aingadis naka ikapun.
text.lgg: Eri gbanza i vileri ma ti o'ba trayi ofeta mbavusi 'bani onze eri ma musaraasirisi
text.nyn: Nashaashura looni ye buri mwezi arikukozesa sente ezirikusharwaho baaka aha mushaara gwe.

text.eng: Don’t leave right now.
text.lug: Togenda kati.
text.ach: Pe iwek kombedi.
text.teo: Sirikinyou kwape kwana.
text.lgg: Eku sawa 'disi ku
text.nyn: Otakagyenda eshaha ezi.

text.eng: It is rare to find a father raising his children by himself.
text.lug: Ssi kya bulijjo okusanga taata ng'akuza abaana be yekka.
text.ach: Pe yot me nongo wego matye ka gwoko lutinone kene.
text.teo: Mam etapit adumun papa loitopoli idwe ngesi bon.
text.lgg: Eri alaa ru ata ni anzi ezoria eri ngolopisi.
text.nyn: Ti kirikwanguha okushanga omushaija arikweyororera abaana be.

text.eng: The rain hit me.
text.lug: Enkuba yankubye.
text.ach: Kot ogoya adada.
text.teo: Abu edou ikam eong.
text.lgg: Ozoo gba ma ra
text.nyn: Enjura ekanteera.

text.eng: The Queen of England first visited Uganda in one thousand nine hundred fifty four.
text.lug: Nnabakyala wa Bungereza yasooka kukyalira Uganda mu lukumi mu lwenda ataano mu ena.
text.ach: Daker me lobo pa England olimo Uganda pi tyen me acel I mwaka alip acel ki miyabungwen ki pyerabic wiye angwen.
text.teo: Abu akabaka nako England kipejok Uganda kokaru elukumit ediope akwatakanyaongon akaisakanyaongon iwongon.
text.lgg: Opi okuru Olayaniri emu okoni omuru Ugandaa alifu alu turu oromi kali towi drini susi
text.nyn: Omwigarire wa Bungyereza akabanza kutaayayyira Uganda omu mwaka gwa rukimi rwenda makumi atano nena.

text.eng: There was a fight yesterday.
text.lug: Waabaddewo okulwanagana eggulo.
text.ach: Lweny obedo tye laworo
text.teo: Ajai bian ejie.
text.lgg: Aco azi aje ci
text.nyn: Habaireho endwano nyomwabazyo.

text.eng: We have to rectify the mistakes that we made
text.lug: Tulina okutereeza ensobi ze twakola
text.ach: Omyero wayub jami ma wabalo ikwo wa
text.teo: Ekot oni aitemonokin adiakanareta nu iswama oni.
text.lgg: Le ama ma otu onzi amani 'ye 'diyi ra.
text.nyn: Twine kutereeza enshobi ezi twakozire.

text.eng: All pensioners should be given their money without fail
text.lug: Bonna abalina okufuna akasiimo balina okuweebwa ssente zaabwe awatali kulemererwa
text.ach: Dano ma camo pension omyero gunong cente gi labongo keng
text.teo: Ekot aijaikin eyengunak kere ikapun kec komam atwaniar.
text.lgg: Ba nga 'ba ndra azi nga'ba gamete ni di azi kupi ra 'diyi ma robia fe eyidri ecekokoru
text.nyn: Abahumwire boona bashemereire kutunga esente zaabo.

text.eng: The Criminal Investigation Department filed a case.
text.lug: Ekiwayi ekikola ku kunoonyereza emisango kiwandiise omusango
text.ach: Opici ma kwedo bal ocoyo koko me bal
text.teo: Abu Atukot naka Abilak ikisila kipikakisi emusago.
text.lgg: Enyati e'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi ma vuti ondaapiri nzi buku e'yo ondaza ni ma ti ra
text.nyn: Ekitongore kya poriisi ekirikukurira okucondooza kibahandiikireho orubanja.

text.eng: He dragged his wife out of the house.
text.lug: Yasika mukazi we n'amufulumya mu nnyumba.
text.ach: En omako dakone ocore woko.
text.teo: Abu ngesi kiruta akeberu kinga naka etogo.
text.lgg: Eri se i vile okuri jo ma aliarisi amve.
text.nyn: Akakurura omukazi we mpaka aheeru y'enju.

text.eng: It is important to know the difference between campaigning and voting.
text.lug: Kikulu nnyo okumanya enjawulo wakati w'okukuyega n'okulonda.
text.ach: Pire tek tutwal me ngeyo apoka-poka matye I kin bito kwir ki bolo kwir.
text.teo: Ejokuna noi ajenun atiaketait naejai kiding aise keda ekampein.
text.lgg: Eri orodri ru voti ondaza ma esele cozu voti 'beza be.
text.nyn: Nikikuru kumanya entaniso eri ahakuhagira n’okuteera akaruuru.

text.eng: It is becoming expensive to live in Isingiro District.
text.lug: Kyetaagisa ssente nnyingi okubeera mu disitulikiti y'e Isingiro.
text.ach: Kwo I dicitrwik me Isingiro obudoko tek tutwal pi wel cente mamalo mamitte.
text.teo: Euta kwana etiai loka aijar apolor noi kodisitrikta loko Isingoro.
text.lgg: Eri curu'do eca aje ru aa zu Isingiro disitrikitia
text.nyn: Disiturikiti ya Isingiro n'ey'ebeeyi kugituuramu.

text.eng: This road was named after the first prime minister of Uganda.
text.lug: Erinnya ly'oluguudo luno lyabbululwa mu linnya lya ssaabaminisita wa Uganda eyasooka.
text.ach: Kimiyo nying minista ma doro tic pa gamente I ot moko cik me lobo Uganda mukwongo bot yo gudu man.
text.teo: Aponi omaikinai erot ngol ekiror loka eminisita loka apolon loko Uganda.
text.lgg: Ba 'da nzila 'di ma ru drile minista yini andra okori mu vutisi
text.nyn: Oruguuuto oru rukaheebwa eiziina ry'enganzi ya Yuganda eyabandize.

text.eng: The hospital has asked for five million Uganda Shillings to work on the patient.
text.lug: Eddwaliro lisabye obukadde butaano obw'ensimbe za Uganda okusobola okukola ku mulwadde.
text.ach: Ot yat ne openyo ciling milyon abic ka wek gitii I kom latwo ne.
text.teo: Ekoto adekis imilioni ikany kanu aimuke adekak ngun.
text.lgg: Arojo a'i silingi milioni towi azi ngazi 'ba azoruri ma rua
text.nyn: Erwariro ryashab miriyooni itaano za Uganda kujanjaba omurwire.

text.eng: Agriculture becomes difficult in dry areas.
text.lug: Obulimi n'obulunzi bifuuka kuzibu mu bitundu ebirimu omusana.
text.ach: Tic me pur tek totwal ikare me oro
text.teo: Etionuni akoru aiboisio nu eokitos.
text.lgg: Agirikica ni eca ewaru angu a'wiru 'diyi ma alea
text.nyn: Eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa tibyanguhi omu bwire bw'ekyanda.

text.eng: Some people lost their jobs and cannot provide for their families.
text.lug: Abantu abamu baafiirwa emirimu gyabwe era tebasobola kulabirira ba mu maka gaabwe.
text.ach: Dano mogo orwenyo ticgi dong pe giromo gwoko gangigi.
text.teo: Apotu icetunga kotwakiasi aswamisineikec ido mam epedoritos aigang lukokalekec.
text.lgg: Ba azi 'diyi avi azi yini ra azini econi afa fe familia yini 'diyi dri ku
text.nyn: Abantu abamwe bakafeerwa emirimo yaabo tibakabaasa kureberera amaka gaabo.

text.eng: Orphans should be guided and counselled.
text.lug: Bamulekwa balina okulambikibwa n'okubuulirirwa.
text.ach: Omyero ki mii tam ki lutino kic dok ki nyut it gi yoo maber
text.teo: Ekot ikokiok aitodinokinio nuiswama ka aicor.
text.lgg: Le 'ba ma fe emvua anzi eyini imbata azini atita
text.nyn: Efuuzi zishemereire kuhaburwa n'okuhuumurizibwa.

text.eng: Farmers can grow crops and rear animals at the same time.
text.lug: Abalimi basobola okulima ebimera n'okulunda ebisolo mu budde bwe bumu.
text.ach: Lupur twero puru cam kibene gwoko lee
text.teo: Epedorete akoriok akoru ikorion ka aipit ibaren apak adiope.
text.lgg: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi eco ori eyi ezo azini anyapa eyi ma ta mba sa'wa aluri ma alea ra
text.nyn: Abahingi nibabaasa kuhinga ebihingwa, kandi bagira n'amatungo aha murundi nigwo gumwe.

text.eng: A new chairperson will soon be elected.
text.lug: Ssentebe omuggya ajja kulondebwa mu bwangu.
text.ach: Kibi yero won kom manyen cok coki
text.teo: Eyapie aseun apolon eicolong loitetet.
text.lgg: Ba nga 'Bili ei o'diru ni pe mbeleru ra
text.nyn: Mukuru w'entebe omusya naija kuba yatooranwa juba.

text.eng: Of the two, who is fooling who?’
text.lug: Ku bombi ani abuzaabuza munne?’
text.ach: I kin jo aryo egoni, anga matye kanywaro lawote?
text.teo: Kotoma itunga ngul iarei, ingai bo euta aboliar jo?
text.lgg: Eri 'diyi ma eselea, a'dini a'dini ole ni?
text.nyn: Omuri babiri,nooha orikubeiha ondiijo?

text.eng: The wildlife day is celebrated on the third of June annually.
text.lug: Olunaku lw'ebisolo lukuzibwa nga ssatu ogw'omukaaga buli mwaka.
text.ach: Nino me kwero kwo ma itim ki timo inino dwe adek me dwe me abicel mwaka ki mwaka
text.teo: Inuminumio aparan na iboro kalu okitwi eraas auni olap lo ikanyetape kangol karu.
text.lgg: Ba anyapa asea 'diyi inzi imba azia mba o'du na si eli alu alu vusi
text.nyn: Eizooba ry'enyamaishwa, nibarijaguza ebiro bishatu, okweezi kwa mukaaga buri mwaka.

text.eng: She was the first woman to wear trousers in this office.
text.lug: Ye mukazi eyasooka okwambala empale mu ofiisi eno.
text.ach: En aye obedo dako me acel ma ocako ruko long ki i opic man.
text.teo: Arai ngesi aberu nasodit ainap edabada koyapesi kalo.
text.lgg: Eri ndra oku oko torozi supi ofisi 'di ma aliari'i
text.nyn: Akaba omukazi wokubanza okujwara empare omu ofiisi egi.

text.eng: We work to better our standards of living.
text.lug: Tukola okusobola okulongoosa embeera yaffe ey'obulamu.
text.ach: Watiyo tic wek kwowa obed maber.
text.teo: Iswamai sio kagogong kanu aikeun adoketait naka aijar.
text.lgg: Ama azi nga lezu idri nyaza amaniri otuzu.
text.nyn: Nitukora kureeba emituurire yaitu  yabonera.

text.eng: My uncle gave me a wonderful present at my graduation party.
text.lug: Kojja wange yampa ekirabo ekirungi ennyo ku mukolo ggwange ogw'amattikira.
text.ach: Nera omiya mic maber i nino me kwero tyeko kwanna.
text.teo: Abu mamaika ijaik eong ainakinet naejok noi kotoma opucit loalomuna eong kosomero.
text.lgg: Ma adroyi fe mani afa feza ndrizaruni o'du ma vile omu oku suzuri nyazurisi
text.nyn: Shwento akampeereza ekirabo kirungi aha mbaga yangye y'okujwara.

text.eng: Only guests are expected to attend the ceremony.
text.lug: Abagenyi abayite bokka be basuubirwa okujja ku mukolo.
text.ach: Wele makilwongo alwongo keken mabibino I kwer ne.
text.teo: Ipejok luenyaraunitai bon kesi ekotoi kojaikinos toma opucit.
text.lgg: Ba omvele omve 'diyi lu nga emu omua nderia ni
text.nyn: Abagyenyi abeesirwe bonka nibo barikuteekwateekwa kuza aha mukoro.

text.eng: Partnerships are one of the benefits of being in a student association.
text.lug: Emikago gye gimu ku miganyulo gy'okubeera mu bibiina by'obwegassi.
text.ach: Kube ki dano mukene obedo gin acel ma dano matye i dul pa lutino kwan nongo
text.teo: Aiswamanara nes adiopet kotoma ajokisio nu ajaut atukot naka esisiak.
text.lgg: Azi ngaza tualuri eri orodri aa'zu amuti sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma azi
text.nyn: Okukwatanisa, nigwo mugasho gw'okukora ekibiina ky'abeegi.

text.eng: My father is in the army.
text.lug: Taata wange ali mu magye.
text.ach: Baba na obedo lamwony
text.teo: Ejai papaka ajore.
text.lgg: Ma ata ni asikaria.
text.nyn: Taata ari omumahe.

text.eng: Where is your belief?
text.lug: Okukkiriza kwo kuli wa?
text.ach: Niye ni tye kwene?
text.teo: Aibo ejai aiyuun kon?
text.lgg: A'itaa miniri ngua?
text.nyn: Ori munyikiriza eha?

text.eng: Why was the baby crying?
text.lug: Lwaki omwana yali akaaba?
text.ach: Pingo latin tye ka koko?
text.teo: Kanukinyo autar ikoku aimony?
text.lgg: Odekua ri de owu a'di e'yosi?
text.nyn: Ahabweki omwana yaba narira?

text.eng: Early child marriages have resulted in many girls dropping out of school
text.lug: Okufumbirwa amangu mu baana kireetedde abawala bangi okuva mu masomero.
text.ach: Nyomo lutino con oweko lutino mapol oweko kwan woko
text.teo: Idwe alinganakin edukone ayangau apesur nuipu aibironor kosomero.
text.lgg: Ezoanzi karakara eyi ku sukulu ja e'yo eyini eyi 'duzu drioru risi.
text.nyn: Abaana okuza omu by'obushwere bakiri bato, nikituma abaishiki baingi baruga omu mashomero.

text.eng: My company rewards the best performing employees every year.
text.lug: Buli mwaka, kampuni mwe nkolera ewa ebirabo abakozi baayo abasinze okukola obulungi.
text.ach: Kampunina miyo mot pi jo ma gutimo maber mwaka ki mwaka.
text.teo: Eropenenei ekampunika eswamak luajokak kakere kangolikaru
text.lgg: Amuti ma vilerini dria dria fe 'ba azi nga'ba onyiru ndeni 'diyi dri eli dria vusi.
text.nyn: Kampuni yangye neehemba abakozi baayo abarikukora gye ibara mwaka.

text.eng: The President was speaking during a meeting with the visiting Ethiopian Public Diplomacy Team.
text.lug: Omukulembeze w'eggwanga yayogera mu lukiiko olwalimu abakungu okuva mu Ethopia.
text.ach: President obedo ka lok  ikare me rwatte ki dul pa luwang lobo Ethiopia ma gubino kalim
text.teo: Auta lokapolon akwap einer kotoma airiamunet keda Epejonon Loka Etiimu Loko Ethiopia.
text.lgg: Prisdent ri de e'yo nze drifuza amuti omu ru ojio o'bi Ethiopia 'diyi be ri ma alia
text.nyn: Museveni abaire naagamba aha mukoro gw'okwakiira abajwekyerwa bakuru abataayaayire Uganda kuruga omuri Ethiopia.

text.eng: What is your profession?
text.lug: Wakuguka mu ki?
text.ach: Diro me tic ango ma itye kwede?
text.teo: Inyobo aswam kon?
text.lgg: Azi mini nga ri eri a'duni?
text.nyn: Okashoma ki?

text.eng: The committee members had a meeting.
text.lug: Abatuula ku kakiiko k'oku ntikko baalina akakiiko.
text.ach: Lumemba me committee gubedo ki kacoke
text.teo: Apotu imeban luko okomiti ojaikinos airiamun.
text.lgg: Ba Komiti 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi andru ra
text.nyn: Bamemba bakakiiko, bakashutama.

text.eng: The minister condemned the dispute.
text.lug: Minisita yavumiridde obutakkaanya obwo.
text.ach: Minicta ne oyeto daa ne.
text.teo: Abu eminisita kimik ecelet ngon.
text.lgg: Drile okalamvu gamete niri ni a'da e'yo 'ba yi ma eselia ri ma ale ra.
text.nyn: Minisita ajumiriire omushango.

text.eng: I am happy that my old friends finally fell in love with each other.
text.lug: Ndi musanyufu nti mikwano gyange emikadde gyamaze ne gyagalana.
text.ach: Cwinya yom ni lurema ma con gitye imar
text.teo: Eyalama eong naarai ipapero ka lumojong aminanaros.

text.ach: Lucung iwi bye kacel lucwakgi gunyweno wii lubol kwir ki lucwak.
text.teo: Abwoak keda egangitok kere mam ejenete atiaketai naejai kiding aseak keda egangitok.
text.lgg: Ba politiki-a 'diyi, o'bi yi atipi 'diyi pie, abaza fe o'bi voti' bepi azini o'bi yi atipi 'diyi ma eselea.
text.nyn: Ab’ebyobutegyeki hamwe n’abahagizi baabo nibaburabuza abateezi bakaruuru hamwe nabarikubashagika.

text.eng: The building plan was presented to the congregation after prayers.
text.lug: Pulaani y'ekizimbe yayanjulibwa olukungaana oluvannyuma lw'okusaba.
text.ach: Kiyaro plan me gedo manyen ni bot lucristayo inge lega
text.teo: Aponi itodikinai ikristayon epulani lo aduketait akaulo na ailipasinei.
text.lgg: Ba e'da otita jo nde sizuri Kristiani eyini Izita vutia
text.nyn: Enteekateeka y'ekyombeko, ekoorekwa abantu ahanyima y'okushaba.

text.eng: Her health gradually declined as she aged.
text.lug: Obulamu bwe bwagenda bwonooneka bwe yagenda akula.
text.ach: Yoto kome odok piny motmot ka en woto ki tii.
text.teo: Abu akeijar kinyikok aroniar namojongia ngesi.
text.lgg: Eri ma rua alata ri emvi e'yere erini droria deria
text.nyn: Amagara ge gakaba mabi ku yaagumire naakura.

text.eng: Police requested the family to vacate the land as early as possible.
text.lug: Poliisi yasabye famire eve ku ttaka mu bwangu ddala.
text.ach: Police okwayo jo ot me aa woko ki ingom meno con
text.teo: Abu polis ilipite ekale anyoun alupok atipet.
text.lgg: Polisi eyi ai familia 'da nyaku 'da ku zu mbeleru.
text.nyn: Poriisi ekashaba famire okuruga ahaitaka bukiri kare, nk'oku kirikubaasika.

text.eng: We need to promote peace in Northern Uganda.
text.lug: Twetaaga okutumbula eddembe mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
text.ach: Omyero wa wek kuc obed tye i kumalo me Uganda
text.teo: Ekot oni aitopolor aipuc ko Nyakoi nako Uganda.
text.lgg: Le ama ma otu asianzu ma omgbo kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea
text.nyn: Twine kushongyera obusingye omu kicweka ky'amatemba ga Uganda.

text.eng: You must be drunk now.
text.lug: Oteekwa okuba nga kati otamidde.
text.ach: Atamo imer dong.
text.teo: Ajeni eong ebe imera jo.
text.lgg: Mi ati te 'di sawa 'disi 'bo
text.nyn: Oine kuba otsinzire.

text.eng: I do not think that radio-based learning is effective enough.
text.lug: Ssirowooza nti okusoma okw'oku leediyo kulungi ekimala.
text.ach: Pe atamo ni kwan kun lutino winyo pwony awinya ki redio twero weko lutino niang pwony maber.
text.teo: Mam eong aomit bala ingarakini aisisia naka eredio.
text.lgg: Ma egani kini embata geri radioasiri eco ovu orodriru ra 'dnin ku
text.nyn: Tindikuhamya ngu okushomera aha za radiyo kurimu kihango.

text.eng: People have been advised to stop taking bribes.
text.lug: Abantu baweereddwa amagezi okukomya okulya enguzi.
text.ach: Ki lego dano me juku gamo kitu kidogo
text.teo: Aponi olimokinai itunga apalar aijajatoi ikapun.
text.lgg: ꞌBa ꞌba yi dri embata fe afa ti razu ꞌdiyi aꞌizu ku.
text.nyn: Abantu bahabwirwe okurekyeraaho kutwara ebituga.

text.eng: I gave two street children two thousand Ugandan shillings to buy food.
text.lug: Nnawa abaana babiri ab'oku nguudo sillingi enkumi bbiri mu za Uganda bagulemu emmere.
text.ach: Amiyo ciling alip aryo bot lutino aguu pi wilo cam.
text.teo: Abu eong ainak idwe luiboiete korotin luko taun ikapun ilukumin iarei kanu agwel inyamat.
text.lgg: Afe anzi nzila dria iri yi dri silingi alifu iri nyaka jezu.
text.nyn: Mpaire abaana baaha nguuto siringi ekumi ibiri kugura eby'okurya.

text.eng: My father is the best midfielder in the world.
text.lug: Mu nsi yonna kitange ye muzannyi asinga okuzannya wakati.
text.ach: Babana aye obedo latuk odilo matuko idye bar maber loyo ki I wilobo.
text.teo: Erai papaka abolian loko kiding loka emopira loajokan kakere kotoma akwap kere.
text.lgg: Ama atini 'ba pari agaduari avizasi ala ndeniri'i
text.nyn: Taata niwemuzaani orikusingayo okuzaanira gye omupiira gw'ebigyere ahagati y'ekishaayi omunsi yoona.

text.eng: The government is taxing us almost five times.
text.lug: Gavumenti etuggyako omusolo kumpi emirundi etaano.
text.ach: Gamente weko waculu mucoro tyen ma nyayo abic kulu
text.teo: Itataci apugan isio esolo nepetai irwan akany.
text.lgg: Gamente ni ama dria musoro ali ogogo pale towi
text.nyn: Gavumenti neetushashuza omushoro haihi emirundi etaano.

text.eng: What happened to their friendship?
text.lug: Kiki ekyatuuka ku mukwano gwabwe?
text.ach: Lirem pa joni tye ka wot nining?
text.teo: Inyoin bo abu kotakanik epaperonekec?
text.lgg: A'di e'yo 'ye i agyi 'baza yiniri be ni?
text.nyn: Niki ekyabaire aha bunwani bwabo.

text.eng: The district health department will carry out a yellow fever vaccination.
text.lug: Ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu ku disitulikiti kijja kugema abantu omusujja gw'enkaka.
text.ach: Lutic yoto kom gubu kati ki yub me gwero dano i kom two yellow fever
text.teo: Elosi ewai lo angaleu ko disitrikt aikis ekato loka eimidi loidosoikini akonye.
text.lgg: Arakala rua ala ni distrikiti'a ri ni mu otita 'ba eyi osozu azo yellow fever nirisi ni 'ye
text.nyn: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara ekya Disiturikiti, nikiija kusirika omushwija gw'enkaka.

text.eng: Respondents are asked about the amount of money exchanged.
text.lug: Abantu babuuzibwa ebikwata ku ssente mmeka eziba zivungisiddwa.
text.ach: Kipenyo lugam penyo egoni I kom wel cente magunongo.
text.teo: Aponi kingitai itunga ikapun luaponi kisiesai.
text.lgg: Ba ozi 'ba e'yo omvipi 'diyi ma tia kalafe sende yini ojalerini.
text.nyn: Abarikugarukamu ebibuuzo nibabuuzibwa aha muhendo gw'esente oguhanisiibwe.

text.eng: Teachers are not well paid.
text.lug: Abasomesa tebasasulwa bulungi.
text.ach: Pe ki culu lupwonye maber
text.teo: Mam isisianakinak etacio ejok.
text.lgg: Ba ofeni imba'ba eyi muke ku
text.nyn: Abegyesa tibarikushashurwa gye.
